Parañaque
City

No Contact Apprehension Website


Since moving our base from London to Manila we have had the opportunity to meet and network with up and coming businesses as well as industry main stays. One of our first projects in the Philippines was for a traffic systems company who contracted us to design and develop a responsive custom site for their client - Parañaque City.

We wanted to shake things up with a fresh, bold and modern look ( a signature bamboo studio visual style) and really elevate the overall feel and functionality of a site like this. Our only parameters were to use the iconic green colour palette of the city and to make sure the UX design left visitors feeling at ease and satisfied with their experience; so naturally, we went to town.
